name: $code
desc: Returns: Indicates a meaning for the group. This can be as simple as a unique identifier, or it can establish meaning in a broader context by drawing from a terminology, allowing groups to be correlated across measures.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates a meaning for the group. This can be as simple as a unique identifier, or it can establish meaning in a broader context by drawing from a terminology, allowing groups to be correlated across measures.

name: $description
desc: Returns: The human readable description of this population group.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The human readable description of this population group.

name: $population
desc: Returns: A population criteria for the measure.

name: $addpopulation
desc: A population criteria for the measure.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A population criteria for the measure.

name: $stratifier
desc: Returns: The stratifier criteria for the measure report, specified as either the name of a valid CQL expression defined within a referenced library or a valid FHIR Resource Path.

name: $addstratifier
desc: The stratifier criteria for the measure report, specified as either the name of a valid CQL expression defined within a referenced library or a valid FHIR Resource Path.
